item.title: REAL JavaScript games outside your computer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: “OMG, this Polish freak will talk about web gaming again. WHYY?” “C’mon dude, we all know that it’s possible to make a game in web technologies that run on mobile phone, fridge, printer, gaming console and etc. JUST STAHP!” “AGAIN? JS games are soooo 2011! “If any of the above was you first thought, I’m […]
item.content:encoded: “OMG, this Polish freak will talk about web gaming again. WHYY?” “C’mon dude, we all know that it’s possible to make a game in web technologies that run on mobile phone, fridge, printer, gaming console and etc. JUST STAHP!” “AGAIN? JS games are soooo 2011! “If any of the above was you first thought, I’m sorry to disappoint you. During this talk I’ll present my journey from JavaScript to real board games. The games you use to play with your friends on rainy days 30 years ago. You would probably ask how the hell you can write board version of Chess or Monopoly using JavaScript? Everything will be explained during JSDay this year, see you there :).
